des:
You're just a few words away from a cleaner home! Use your voice to start, stop, schedule cleaning, and more with Alexa. All connected Roomba® and Braava jet® robots are compatible with Alexa, giving you hands-free control for vacuuming and mopping. Simply tell your robots to clean – and consider it done.

Roomba® and Braava jet® robot models with Smart Mapping technology allow you to clean specific rooms or clean zones in your home with just your voice—making it easier than ever to clean up an unexpected mess. Imprint™ Link technology lets you add a mop to your vacuum's cleaning job - first Roomba® vacuums, then Braava jet® m6 automatically mops!

To get started, enable the iRobot® Home skill for Amazon Alexa and sign in to link your existing iRobot® account. You need to already have connected your robot to the iRobot® Home App.

Below are sample commands you can use to control your robots hands-free in your home.

START
• "Alexa, ask Roomba to start vacuuming"
• "Alexa, ask Braava to start mopping"
• "Alexa, ask iRobot to clean with *Rosie and *Bob"***
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to vacuum for 20 minutes"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to vacuum in 15 minutes"
• "Alexa, turn on Rosie"

CLEANING SPECIFIC ROOMS, ZONES, OBJECTS, FAVORITES (works with i/j/s/m series robots; prior setup required in the iRobot Home app)
• "Alexa, ask Roomba to vacuum the master bedroom"
• "Alexa, ask Braava to mop my kitchen with a lot of water"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba there is a mess in the kitchen and living room"**
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to vacuum and Braava to mop the kitchen"***
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to vacuum in front of the couch once"
• "Alexa, tell iRobot to run my dinnertime favorite"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to vacuum the dirty rooms"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba party in the den"


MID-MISSION EDITS
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to pause vacuuming"
• "Alexa, ask Braava to resume mopping"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to go home"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to stop vacuuming"
• "Alexa, tell Braava to stop sweeping"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to not disturb me"
• "Alexa, tell Roomba to skip this room"


LOCATE
• "Alexa, ask Roomba where it is"

STATUS
• "Alexa, ask Roomba what it's doing"
• "Alexa, ask Braava if it's done yet"

SCHEDULING
• "Alexa, ask Roomba to schedule vacuuming"


*Rosie and Bob are example robot names. After naming your Roomba®, Braava jet®, or Klaara® in the iRobot® HOME app, you can use its name to control it with Alexa, but just remember to say "Roomba", "Braava", or "iRobot" first to invoke the skill.
**Individual room cleaning is supported for up to 2 rooms in a single command.
***This feature requires both a Roomba® (i/j/s/900 series), and a Braava jet® (m series) to be connected to your account.
